Module com.library
Package com.library.Services

Class DeleteLoanService

java.lang.Object
com.library.Services.DeleteLoanService
public class DeleteLoanService extends Object
A class that provides different services for deleting loans and books from the library system based on the use cases. Interacts with the LoanManager and BookService to perform the deletion operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a new DeleteLoanService instance.

    deleteBooksandLoansByCategory(String category)
    Removes from the library all books that belong to a specific book category and their associated loans .
    void
    deleteLoan(Loan loan)
    Removes a specific loan from the loan manager and updates the number of copies of the corresponding book in the book service.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeleteLoanService

      public DeleteLoanService(LoanManager loanManager, BookService bookService)
      Constructs a new DeleteLoanService instance.
      Parameters:
      loanManager - The LoanManager to interact with.
      bookService - The BookService to interact with.

  • Method Details

    • deleteLoan

      public void deleteLoan(Loan loan)
      Removes a specific loan from the loan manager and updates the number of copies of the corresponding book in the book service.
      Parameters:
      loan - The loan to be deleted.

    • deleteLoansByBookId

      public void deleteLoansByBookId(UUID bookId)
      Removes all loans associated with a specific book from the loan manager. Used right before the deletion of a book.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The unique identifier of the book.

    • deleteBookAndLoan

      public void deleteBookAndLoan(Book book)
      Provides the complete procedure for a deletion of a book. Removes a specific book from the library using the implemented book service and all associated loans from the loan manager.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be deleted.

    • deleteBooksandLoansByCategory

      public void deleteBooksandLoansByCategory(String category)
      Removes from the library all books that belong to a specific book category and their associated loans .
      Parameters:
      category - The category of the books to delete.
